member.name: T:WatsonTcp.AuthenticationFailedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a client fails authentication.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.AuthenticationRequestedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when authentication is requested from a client.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.AuthenticationSucceededEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a client successfully authenticates.

member.name: M:WatsonTcp.ClientMetadata.Dispose
member.summary: Tear down the object and dispose of resources.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.ConnectionEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a connection is established.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.ConnectionEventArgs.IpPort
member.summary: The IP:port of the endpoint to which the connection was established.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.DisconnectionEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a disconnection is encountered.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.DisconnectionEventArgs.IpPort
member.summary: The IP:port of the endpoint for which the disconnection was detected.

member.name: F:WatsonTcp.DisconnectReason.Removed
member.summary: Client connection was intentionally terminated programmatically or by the server.

member.name: F:WatsonTcp.DisconnectReason.Timeout
member.summary: Client connection timed out; server did not receive data within the timeout window.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.ExceptionEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when an exception is encountered.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.MessageReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a message is received.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.MessageReceivedEventArgs.Metadata
member.summary: The metadata received from the endpoint.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.MessageReceivedEventArgs.Data
member.summary: The data received from the endpoint.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.StreamReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for when a stream is received.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.StreamReceivedEventArgs.Metadata
member.summary: The metadata received from the endpoint.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.StreamReceivedEventArgs.ContentLength
member.summary: The number of data bytes that should be read from DataStream.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.StreamReceivedEventArgs.DataStream
member.summary: The stream containing the message data.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.StreamReceivedEventArgs.Data
member.summary: The data from DataStream. Using Data will fully read the contents of DataStream.

member.name: T:WatsonTcp.SyncRequest
member.summary: Request that demands a response within a specific timeout.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.SyncRequest.IpPort
member.summary: IP:port from which the request was received.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.SyncRequest.ExpirationUtc
member.summary: The time at which the request expires.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.SyncResponse.Metadata
member.summary: Metadata to attach to the response.

member.name: P:WatsonTcp.SyncResponse.Data
member.summary: Data to attach to the response.
